  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3124</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3124</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Literatura. Poesia i paisatge</string>
            <string language="en">Literature. Poetry and landscape</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur. Poesie und Landschaft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Littérature. Poésie et horizontal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Literatura. Poesia e paisagem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Letteratura. Poesia e paesaggio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λογοτεχνία. Ποίηση και τοπίο</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recurs interactiu que tracta de la poesia i del paisatge -la natura i la ciutat-.  S'hi estudien els principals recursos literaris: homofonia, cacofonia, al·literació, onomatopeia, etc.  Textos de Jacint Verdaguer -Vora la mar-, Charles Baudelaire -Correspondències-, Joan Maragall -Pirinenques- i Miquel Costa i Llobera -El pi de Formentor-. Activitats d'autoavaluació per a la pràctica dels continguts de la unitat.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive resource on poetry and landscape - country and urban. It studies the main literary resources: homophony, cacophony, alliteration, onomatopoeia, etc. Sample texts from Jacint Verdaguer's "Beside the Sea", Charles Baudelaire's "Correspondences", Joan Maragall's "Pyrenees", and Miquel Costa i Llobera's "The Formentor Pine". Self-assessment activities are also included for practice.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gènere literari</string>
            <string language="en">literary genre</string>
            <string language="es">género literario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">literatura</string>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
            <string language="es">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">poesia</string>
            <string language="en">poetry</string>
            <string language="es">poesía</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktives Hilfsmittel auf Poesie und 
Landschaft - Land und städtisches. Es studiert die 
literarischen hauptsächlichbetriebsmittel: Homophonie, 
cacophony, Alliteration, onomatopoeia, usw.. Beispieltexte von
Jacint Verdaguers "neben dem Meer", Charles Baudelaires "den 
Korrespondenzen", Joan Maragalls "Pyrenees" und Miquel Costa I 
Lloberas "die Formentor Kiefer". Selbstbewertung Aktivitäten 
sind auch für Praxis eingeschlossen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource interactive sur la poésie et 
l'horizontal - pays et urbain. Elle étudie les ressources 
littéraires principales : homophony, cacophonie, allitération,
onomatopoeia, etc... Textes témoin de Jacint Verdaguer "près 
de la mer", des "correspondances" de Charles Baudelaire, des 
"Pyrénées" de Joan Maragall, et de Miquel le pin de Formentor du 
costa i Llobera "". Des activités de art de l'auto-portrait-assessment sont 
également incluses pour la pratique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso interativo na poesia e na paisagem - 
país e urbano. Estuda os recursos literários principais: 
homophony, cacophony, alliteration, onomatopoeia, etc.. 
Textos da amostra de Jacint Verdaguer "ao lado do mar", das 
"correspondências" de Charles Baudelaire, dos "Pyrenees" de Joan 
Maragall, e do Miquel o pinho de Formentor da costela i Llobera "". 
As atividades do self-assessment são incluídas também para a 
prática.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa interattiva su poesia e sul paesaggio - 
paese ed urbano. Studia le risorse letterarie principali: 
homophony, cacophony, alliteration, onomatopoeia, ecc. 
Testi del campione da Jacint Verdaguer "al lato del mare", 
"delle corrispondenze" del Charles Baudelaire, "di Pyrenees" di Joan 
Maragall e di Miquel il pino di Formentor del costa i Llobera "". 
Le attività di valutazione di se stesso egualmente sono incluse
per pratica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικό στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς στην ποίηση και το 
τοπίο - χώρα και αστικός. Μελετά τα βασικά λογοτεχνικά 
στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς: ομοφωνία, κακοφωνία, παρήχηση, 
ονοματοποιία, κείμενα δείγματα κ.λπ. από Jacint Verdaguer 
"εκτός από τη θάλασσα", "αλληλογραφίεσ" Charles 
Baudelaire's, "Πυρηναία" του Joan Maragall's, και πεύκο 
Formentor Miquel Costa ι llobera "το". Οι 
δραστηριότητες αυτοαξιολόγησης συμπεριλαμβάνονται επίσης για την 
πρακτική.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">literarisches Genre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Poesie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">genre littéraire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">littérature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">poésie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">genre literário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">poesia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">genere letterario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">letteratura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">poesia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λογοτεχνικό ύφος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λογοτεχνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ποίηση</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
